original_title: Say Swear: This is one way we can find each other if we ever get lost
overview: Western Sydney artists Justine Youssef and Leila El Reyes collaborate with community residents in the region to create Say Swear, which subverts the format of the Mortal Kombat video game to explore queer, female and non-binary Arab identities in Sydney’s Western ‘area’ subcultures.
title: Say Swear: This is one way we can find each other if we ever get lost
